BushTripInjector.ChangeLog:
0.8.0.1092 HIGHLIGHT: Unlocking the Secret of 'AssistancePresets'! *Your Controls:* BushTripInjector gives you the control over all assistance options. It is your choice which settings are set and whether they should be unlocked for the user. Attention: Not all combination could be testet, some of the settings may not work or break the BushTrip. Please check your desired settings with your trip.
USER-REQ: Paste Coords from Google Maps (and others) into Landmarks-Dialog (koschi) USER-REQ: Determinate the Altitude of Landmark in Landmarkwindow. UPDATE: New Runway Surfaces for Airport Creation: FOREST, GRASS_BUMPY, HARD_TURF, LONG_GRASS, SHORT_GRASS, URBAN and WRIGHT_FLYER_TRACK UPDATE: Fixed another thing for crazy steam installations (seems to be steam fix weeks again) UPDATE: *Some better Map REST-API Handling to investigate an issue with expired SessionIds.*
--- 0.7.9.1078 A small intermediate update in front of a bigger thing.
UPDATE: Fixed a bug for steam and DVD version, if the link is configured to run as admin. (BigLightbolt) UPDATE: Fixed a bug on startup, if community folder is not accessible (f99mlu) UPDATE: Fixed a bug for refueling after leaving the trip (koschi)
--- 0.7.8.1056 HIGHLIGHT: BushTripInjector introduces 'Landmarks'! Define your own highlights of your tour with your own POIs: Cities, Fauna, Landmarks Just right click in the WorldMap to add a new POI.
UPDATE: Startup Optimization: Parallel loading of Airport, Runway and Parking Database. If you encounter some issues, set 'LoadDatabaseParallel' to 'False' in BushTripInjector.ini UPDATE: If BTI detects steam, but no params to compile are set, detect them from steam UPDATE: Performance optimizations Logger.
